text:
Never heard of "case studies" in HubSpot CMS
Can you share a screenshot of where you saw that feature?
Thanks! Is it part of the blog pages, website pages, or something else?

The case studies are in a separate beta version and not in the blog. I want to display the first 3 case studies similar to how I would in the blog’s RSS listing or related posts module. That’s why I’m asking if I can do something similar for case studies.

Hey everyone! New here and hoping this is the right place to ask this question. I have a kb.js file in my child theme folder. I have the minified version loading in the kb template. I made changes to the kb.js file but it’s not updating the kb.min.js file. Is there a way to get this to update?
